thesongstress:AngelicChords.NAME: Angelic Chords
DESCRIPTIONS: Each turn, the first time you play an #yAttack that costs #b
or more, a random card in your hand costs #b0 for the turn.

thesongstress:ForgedDrums.NAME: Forged Drums
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you smith at a rest site, heal #b

thesongstress:Harpsichord.NAME: Harpsichord
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain Strength or Dexterity, deal #b
damage to the enemy with the lowest HP.

thesongstress:HarmonicChords.NAME: Harmonic Chords
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play an #yAttack that costs #b
or more, a random card in your hand costs #b0 for the turn.

thesongstress:Metronome.NAME: Metronome
DESCRIPTIONS: NOT IMPLEMENTED YET! At the beginning of combat, play a random card from any class, then #yExhaust it.
